section.title: Requirements to implement AtkAction interfaces
section.para: Atk actions expose actions for widgets. It's used for buttons and similar, to let the ATK layer launch the actions related to them.
Each action has the following properties:

itemizedlist.listitem: A name: a short name of the action
A description: a verbose description of the action
A localized name: the name, through the l10n layer.
A keybinding: the current key binding of the action.

section.para: We should implement at least information for name, and maybe keybinding. All actions have an index, and the methods get_name, get_description, get_localized_name and get_keybinding have an index parameter.
